website_summaries.verdict: Helps with many different aspects of eye health using EPA and DHA sourced from fish oil.
pros: Provides benefits for long-term health, including reducing the effects of strong light, developing healthy eye moisture, and encouraging long-term macular health
All ingredients come from safely sourced fish
cons: Has an above average price per soft gel
Some problems with quality control of product

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying 120 capsule bottle for months now and can truly say its the best quality product out there in the market. It is heavy on the budget given its nordic origin but I would still choose it over other products as it does not give any fish burps. I also happen to like the smooth texture of the capsules even though they make seem a little big for old people.
customer_reviews.author: Ankit Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Optomitrist suggested & no fish smell
customer_reviews.text: I buy these because my optometrist suggested them to help with my macular degeneration, he sells them in his office, but I get the exact product here on Amazon for less. They do not make your breath smell like fish.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Illegible expiration date
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my ophth. It arrived within 2 days, which is good considering I'm still waiting for another product to arrive that was ordered Jan 23, 2020. I've requested a replacement of ProDHA Eye/Nordic Naturals because the expiration date is not legible and appears smudged. Hopefully the replacement will arrive quickly. I will update once I've used the supplement for a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Poma

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended to me by my optometrist
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my optometrist. The only downside to this is the price. It is very expensive. I am considering taking a different Nordic Naturals fish oil product and then add a lutein and zeaxanthin supplement. I think it would be less expensive. But Nordic Naturals is supposed to be the best.
customer_reviews.author: Corkybea

customer_reviews.title: MY EYES ADORE YOU!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this supplement. My eyes feel normal when I take two of these a day. If I don't take these my eyes are dry and painful. I've tried other products but always come back to ProDHA Eye for relief. Yes it is pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kneale

customer_reviews.title: The only eye supplement with good numbers.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's pricey, but you won't find it's equivalent anywhere else.

customer_reviews.title: Works effectively
customer_reviews.text: My eyes hurt after a day long computer work and this prevents and relieves the pain. Have reordered several times.

customer_reviews.title: Eyes are less irritated!
customer_reviews.text: It took about 3 weeks to experience results, but it's been with the wait. My eyes are less irritated due to dryness and my vision is improved because of less irritation. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: none
customer_reviews.text: There is no flavor, but it always arrives very quickly and I'm grateful because I always order late. I take it for relief of brain fog and for eye clarity.

customer_reviews.text: My Dad stopped taking this when he was in the hospital and his eye turned red a itchy. Cataract related. Took 2 pills a day in 2 days his eye was normal again. It works.

customer_reviews.title: No more blur!
customer_reviews.text: In our family we get very blurry vision with certain viruses like a cold and it can last longer than the illness. Pro DHA Eye gets us back on track so quickly it's remarkable - sometimes within hours, if not definitely with in a few days. I can't believe I used to look for my glasses and suffer for a week or 2 after a virus. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: E Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nordic Naturals for eye health

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not not receive this item. Instead, I received ProDHA 1000.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good if you plan on getting older
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my eye doctor (optometrist) as something to help stabilize age-related macular degeneration, which most people probably get to some degree. I've been taking 2 a day for a few years - expensive but I feel its worth it. This brand seems to be the most legit - this is unregulated territory so picking a brand is very important. I've bought this several times and find ProDHA Eye to be the best value. This is the packaging the optometrist sells - a consumer version is labelled differently and only comes in 60 gel capsules and is more expensive. That's why I but this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stumpf

customer_reviews.title: Best Omega 3 eye formula
customer_reviews.text: My Optometrist highly recommended this particular manufacturer for 2 of their eye formulations. I’ve tried both to save my eyes from macular degeneration that may be inherited. I’m showing early signs of retinal thining and figure the high price for this product is worth my vision. I use this formula as it also improves my vision. My eyeglass and contact prescriptions are much improved on this formula. However, my Optometrist insists that it’s not due to this particular eye formula. Aside: my vision also improved with their other eye formula, just not to the same degree.
customer_reviews.author: Rei

customer_reviews.title: Product is excellent but very expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great combo for eye and brain health - does seems to make a difference on both fronts. I would give it 5 stars, but it's so darned expensive (especially since the recommended dose is 2 a day), it gets dinged one star. It doesn't have the copper and such that other eye vitamins have, so we give my dad ONE tablet a day plus 1/2 of an Ocuvite. My mom takes 2 of these a day, and it definitely seems to have helped her wet MD condition, which is now dry. A very good expiry from the provider. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: mmv

customer_reviews.title: Trust the name
customer_reviews.text: All the Nordic Naturals Omega 3 varieties are great products. This one adds in some supplements for the eyes and although it doesn't fix eyesight, it certainly can't hurt. I've worked on computers 11 hours a day for a couple decades so my eyes are important to me so anything I can do to help them I'll try and Nordic Naturals is a name I trust. Many Omega 3's leave that fishy repeat but not Nordic Naturals.
customer_reviews.author: TMH

customer_reviews.title: My eyes were experiencing a lot of dryness and tiredness ...
customer_reviews.text: My eyes were experiencing a lot of dryness and tiredness, but after 30+ days of these gels, I can definitely say that both of those problems have decreased. I still have occasional issues, but much less frequent. And no side effects that I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: gracie

customer_reviews.title: Dry Eye Relief
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended by my eye doctor as a treatment for dry eye. He says other patient swear by it. I am encouraged that there is a supplement to arrest this condition. I agree. The supplement does help. I do not have the buildup on my eyes and eyelashes in the morning and less eye drops throughout the day..
customer_reviews.author: KIP

customer_reviews.title: Great product. A bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I really have noticed a difference in many aspects of my body, eyes, skin, clear thinking I have been using this since May 2019 (7 months).
customer_reviews.author: Rubysuesday

customer_reviews.title: An ounce of prevention
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years (previously known as Omega Vision). My dad went blind, so I had to help him during the last years of his life. I no longer took eyesight for granted and began taking OTC medications that were recommended for him by the Blind Center where he lived. So far so good. I hope the ounce of prevention works. Not yet old enough to find out.
customer_reviews.author: GHB

customer_reviews.title: Solution for chronic dry eye
customer_reviews.text: If you have any type of persistent dry eye problem these are amazing. After consistent use for a couple months I can definitely feel a difference. Well worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: Buy them

product_meta.title: Nordic Naturals ProDHA Eye - Fish Oil, 360 mg EPA, 845 mg DHA, 20 mg FloraGLO Lutein, 4 mg Zeaxanthin, Support for Neurological Function and Long-Term Eye Health*, 120 Soft Gels
feature_bullets: 90+% triglyceride form DHA and EPA from fish oil plus condition-specific nutrients
Provides powerful antioxidant support to address oxidative stress in the retina
FloraGLO lutein protects eyes from environmental stressors like ultraviolet blue light
